text:
*<!everyone>* happy friday folks!
• we had quite a bit of interest in web3 from tuesday's announcement. i propose that we start with an AMA/hangout. i'll bring in some folks to educate us, then we can decide if a web3 channel makes sense. more details to come! :crystal_ball:
• the old guest post channel is now <#CKRJX5U5A|collab> (great idea <@UJFELMVU1>). if you're looking for guest post opportunities, partner marketing or co-branded campaigns, this is your spot. :handshake:
• you'll see some job ads below for superpath. some context: we are getting the marketplace up and running and i'm using the job board to find folks to write about specific topic areas. we're paying well and paying on time. we've already got a few folks from the community on board. if you're interested, fill out the short app on the job listing and let me put some money in your pocket! :money_mouth_face:
---
okay, jobs!
:tv: = includes a video Q&A
:zap:️ = new this week
---
:star:*️ featured full-time roles:*
---

:v: jimmy
